turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello! I'd like to get a coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, which store should I put the order in for?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one in Greenwood at 311 South State Rd 135.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. What do you want me to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think I'm going to go with the Iced Caffe Mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yum, that's a good one! What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll do a grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what kind of milk do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just regular, or the 2% kind.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want any whipped cream on it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh yes, definitely!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The menu says this is an espresso drink. Do you need to order any extra "shots" with it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: If they ask, have them just do one shot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. Are there any other special instructions?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I think that will be it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: When would you like to have it ready?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to pick it up as soon as possible, I am getting ready to go on my lunch break.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, it is on order and will be ready in about 15 minutes at the Starbucks on 135.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome. Will I get a receipt?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They are going to send a receipt to your phone via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, thanks so much!
